be_moniest.step3: Show your analysis to the world

payment.title: Pay and Get Payments with Crypto
payment.desc: Binance Pay is a contactless, borderless and secure cryptocurrency payment technology designed by Binance.

questions.question1: How do I become a Moniest on Moniesto?
questions.answer1: After registering on our platform, you can become a moniest in a few steps. Then you are ready to share your analysis with users. Being a Binance user is mandatory as we only make payments through Binance for now.
questions.answer2: Our AI-powered algorithm is designed to detect the accuracy of analyzes by Moniests and provide a score based on their success rate. This helps us identify the most reliable and accurate Moniests.
questions.question3: Can I see a Moniest's score before subscribing?
questions.answer3: Yes, you can see a Moniest's score on their profile page before subscribing to them. This can help you make an informed decision about which Moniest to subscribe to. You can even see their outdated analysis and their results before subscribing.
questions.question4: How do I subscribe to a Moniest?
questions.answer4: From Moniest's profile, choose how many months to subscribe to it. You can then access their analysis after paying the subscription fee via binance, which we will automatically direct you to.

still_question.title: Still have questions?
still_question.header: You can always contact us for your questions and requests

be_moniest.select_payout_method: Determine which payment instrument your subscribers will pay you with.

get_binance_id.title: How to Find My User ID (BUID) on Binance.com
get_binance_id.description: Binance ID or UID is a unique identifier allocated to each account. Follow the below steps to find it on the Binance website or App.

on_app.title: On Binance App:
on_app.desc: Tap the [Profile] icon on the top left corner. You will then see your user ID under your email address.

on_website.title: On Binance website:
on_website.desc: Log in to your account and go to [Profile] - [Dashboard]. You'll see your User ID next to your email address at the top of the page.

submit.becoming_moniest: You become moniest. You can now share your analysis with the world.

be_moniest.folow_steps: You will find all the information you need to get started. Follow our simple steps to become a Moniest.

subs_modal.subs_desc: The total of the months you set will be withdrawn from your account in one go and will be paid monthly to moniest. When you want to cancel, it will be credited back to your account if you have any remaining months. Subscription does not automatically renew after it expires.
subs_modal.if_unsubscribe: If you unsubscribe from {{username}}, you will no longer be able to access content shared by this account for subscribers.

not_advice.message: The information, opinions and recommendations about investing that you find here are not the same as getting advice from an investment advisor. The opinions and recommendations here are just personal opinions of the people who wrote them. Those opinions might not be right for you and your situation. So, if you only use the information you find here to make an investment, you might not get the results you want.
